caption.p: Regression weights of the final model of pro-environmental intention after backward elimination. This final model significantly predicted pro-environmental intention, F(7, 872) = 54.41, p < 0.001, with a large effect size, R2 = 0.30 (adjusted R2 = 0.29). *p < 0.05, ***p < 0.001; coefficients are standardized regression weights.
